h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 2
content: The first Blood of the Iron Bull proper can be found by defeating the Wandering Wight in the Forest of Wolves \- Outside The Wolves location in Black Wind Mountain. From the Shrine, head to the right through the open forest, and you will find the Wight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 2'.
The content is as follows:
The first Blood of the Iron Bull proper can be found by defeating the Wandering Wight in the Forest of Wolves \- Outside The Wolves location in Black Wind Mountain. From the Shrine, head to the right through the open forest, and you will find the Wight.
